leave_request.subject: Leave Request - {dates}
leave_request.body:
Dear {recipient_name},

I would like to request leave from {start_date} to {end_date} for {reason}.

I have ensured that my current projects are up to date and have briefed my team about any pending tasks.

Please let me know if you need any additional information.

Thank you for your consideration.

Best regards,
{sender_name}

sick_leave.subject: Sick Leave Request - {date}
sick_leave.body:
Dear {recipient_name},

I am writing to inform you that I am unwell and will not be able to come to work today ({date}).

I will keep you updated on my recovery and expect to return to work by {return_date}.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
{sender_name}
